Have you looked at the Art and the Sword volume on Owari fittings? I don't
remember the volume, but it was in the late 90s or so.

 

Gordon

From: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com [mailto:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com] On

Subject: [nihontostudy] Followup on Owari Kinko Tsuba and Norisuke

 

List,

Regarding this tsuba: (Mystery Tsuba in Curran Folder)

http://tinyurl. <http://tinyurl.com/lc3j2> com/lc3j2

Following up on the helpful lead provided by Alan
Bale, I was able to borrow a copy of "Owari to Mikawa
no Tanko" aka. Big Blue Owari Den tsuba book.

Reading through it as much as possible and consulting
other texts, I feel the tsuba is an unsigned Owari
kinko tsuba by Norisuke or someone close.

Anyone familiar with the Norisuke kinko work able to
comment? Anyone able to tell me more about Norisuke
kinko work?

I'd appreciate any insight or feedback.

Curran
